item.description:
I am excited to share this wonderful event with my fellow baby boomer gals.  I attended a writing workshop given by author Jamie Cat Callan and figured that we could all learn and benefit from reading and hearing about BONJOUR HAPPINESS - Secrets to Finding Your Joie De Vivre.

excerpt:  Joie de vivre is an attitude. it's a decision you make to live a life of joy.  It's an invitation to this dance called life.  All you have to do is leave the door slightly ajar and listen for the music.  

Read this next one - doesn't it speak to us Baby Boomers?

Speaking about "Saturn return," at this stage, "you have another opportunity to reconsider the past and change the course of your life.  If there are leftover dreams from those early years, you can now embrace them again and bring them to fruition. Rather than thinking of this phase as a "midlife crisis," consider that this is actually another chance to grab the brass ring."

So, join us at the French Cultural Center of Boston on Monday - June 27th at 6p.

A wine reception will follow the discussion.

There is a two dollar meetup fee.

Our Baby Boomer group will pay the member price of $8 at the door.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Bonjour Happiness, Talk by Author Jamie Cat Callan
